Discovery | Atlan Documentation

On this page
Overview:
Atlan's discovery capabilities help users find, understand, and use data assets across your organization. With powerful search, filtering, and browsing features, users can quickly locate relevant data assets, explore their context, and access the information they need to make data-driven decisions.
